entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:58 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
